DatabaseConnectors

Class SqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseConnectors.SqlConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataDownloader, DataUploader

    public class SqlConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    SmartTrolley Class that handles any connections and queries to the SQL database - Inspired from Alasdair's spike
    Version:
    V3.0 [Date Created: 4 Jun 2014], V4.0 [Date Created: 6 Jun 2014], V5.0 [Date Created: 7 Jun 2014]
    Author:
    Thomas, Sam, V2.1 Alick & Prashant [boolean class added for ResultSet testing] [also added execute statement], V4.0 Arash & Jonny [Added methods for ProductsToListTests], V5.0 Prashant [Final Refactoring and commenting], Checked By: Matthew Wells [06/06/14]
